title: MechRunner 1.0 – An endless robotic action game
content: MechRunner is an endless action game that casts you as a powerful mech in stunning cinematic battles against a relentless robotic army.   Game Story On June 30th, 1908 a mysterious explosion took place over the Tunguska River in Siberia, Russia that wiped out trees and wildlife for over 800 square miles. To this day […]

title: Bohemian Killing 1.0 – First Person Adventure, Drama & Mystery Game
content: Nonlinear first person courtroom drama set in the streets of 19th century steampunk Paris!    You find yourself on trial, accused of a brutal murder How far will you go to exonerate yourself? Will you lie, seek evidence to prop your testimony or, perhaps, pretend to be insane? Your imagination is the limit!   Bohemian […]

title: The Creator 7.0 – Create your own logos, page headers, and more
content: The Creator (was The Logo Creator), by Laughingbird Software, creates logos that look like a Photoshop guru spent hours laboring over them! title: PaintCode for Sketch 1.0.2 – Code Generator Plugin for Sketch
content: PaintCode Plugin for Sketch makes it really easy to export your drawings into Swift or Objective-C.   Integrating the generated code into your Xcode projects is simple and straightforward.   By using code, you can make your apps truly resolution-independent. No more 1x, 2x and 3x images.   Version 1.0.2: Release notes were unavailable when […]

title: YemuZip 2.4.8 – Easy-to-use Zip compression utility
content: YemuZip is a simple, no-frills, easy-to-use application for making ZIP files. Unlike the built-in compress function, YemuZip lets you choose between preserving Mac specific metadata and making clean PC-friendly ZIP files. YemuZip also includes convenience like the ability to zip straight into a new email.   Version 2.4.8: Updated the app icon for Retina Display. […]

content: Tab for Google Photos allows you to access Google Photos anywhere. title: Call Recorder for Skype 2.0.3 – Record Conversations and Interviews

title: SizzlingKeys 5.1.4 – iTunes controller
content: SizzlingKeys Lets you control iTunes without leaving your current application. Control all aspects of iTunes with hot keys that are fully-customizable via an intuitive user interface.   Version 5.1.4: Toggle Shuffle now works correctly with iTunes 12.   Intel, 64-bit processor OS X 10.7 or later iTunes 11.2.2 or later
